resources.string: Hi! In order to calculate who is your fortune contact, first we need permission to read your contacts; otherwise the app won\'t work :( . A dialog will show up
Hi once again! This is the last time we bother you! We also need permission to notify you about your luckiness changes. A dialog will show up, just enable this app
You\'re about to know who among your contacts and loved ones will play a key role in your luck ...
Your fortune contact could not be determined!
